doc:
Michael Marisi Ornstein https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Marisi_Ornstein 0 Michael Marisi Ornstein (born 1963) is an American actor and painter. Ornstein studied acting as a child at the American Academy of Dramatic Arts in New York City, and later studied under Stella Adler. After high school, he enrolled in the Mason Gross School of the Arts. He quit after his first year and moved to New York City to begin working professionally. Ornstein's first film credit was for Crossing Delancey, in which he played the minor character Mickey. Television credits include a recurring role as Detective Bonnaventura in Homicide: Life on the Street, and a two-episode arc in Third Watch, as well as parts in Seinfeld, Law Order, Law Order: Special Victims Unit, and Law Order: Criminal Intent. Ornstein's stage acting credits span twenty-five years' worth of new plays in New York City, in addition to creating the role of Louis Ironson in the 1991 World Premiere of Angels in America at the Eureka Theater in San Francisco. Ornstein played Chuck "Chucky" Marstein on Sons of Anarchy and Mayans MC. Michael_Marisi_Ornstein ( born 1963 ) is an_American_actor_and_painter . Ornstein studied_acting as a_child at the_American_Academy of Dramatic_Arts in New_York_City , and later_studied under Stella_Adler . After high_school , he enrolled in the_Mason_Gross_School of the_Arts . He quit after his_first_year and moved to New_York_City to_begin_working professionally . Ornstein 's_first_film_credit was for Crossing_Delancey , in which he played the_minor_character_Mickey . Television_credits include a_recurring_role as Detective_Bonnaventura in Homicide : Life on the_Street , and a_two-episode_arc in Third_Watch , as_well_as parts in Seinfeld_,_Law_ , Law_ : Special_Victims_Unit , and Law_ : Criminal_Intent . Ornstein 's_stage_acting_credits span twenty-five_years '_worth of new_plays in New_York_City , in addition to creating the_role of Louis_Ironson in the_1991_World_Premiere of Angels in America at the_Eureka_Theater in San_Francisco . Ornstein played Chuck_"_Chucky_"_Marstein on Sons of Anarchy_and_Mayans_MC .
